ticket.title: Unable to create any model and unit test that begin with the word 'Test'
ticket.original-body:
After upgrading to rails 2.3.5 and running my tests the following error appears
test_fields(ActionView::TestCase): TypeError: wrong argument type Class (expected Module)
After doing a bit of testing in a new application it looks like this error is thrown whenever a new model is generated beginning with the word 'test'.
ticket.latest-body:
After upgrading to rails 2.3.5 and running my tests the following error appears
test_fields(ActionView::TestCase): TypeError: wrong argument type Class (expected Module)
After doing a bit of testing in a new application it looks like this error is thrown whenever a new model is generated beginning with the word 'test'.
ticket.original-body-html:
After upgrading to rails 2.3.5 and running my tests the following error appears

test_fields(ActionView::TestCase):
TypeError: wrong argument type Class (expected Module)

After doing a bit of testing in a new application it looks like this error is thrown whenever a new model is generated beginning with the word 'test'.

version.body:
After upgrading to rails 2.3.5 and running my tests the following error appears
test_fields(ActionView::TestCase): TypeError: wrong argument type Class (expected Module)
After doing a bit of testing in a new application it looks like this error is thrown whenever a new model is generated beginning with the word 'test' and then the tests are run.
version.body-html:
After upgrading to rails 2.3.5 and running my tests the following error appears

test_fields(ActionView::TestCase):
TypeError: wrong argument type Class (expected Module)

After doing a bit of testing in a new application it looks like this error is thrown whenever a new model is generated beginning with the word 'test' and then the tests are run.
version.title: Unable to create any model and unit test that begin with the word 'Test'

version.body: After further investigation into this, the problem is happening when there is a fixture that starts with the word test.
version.body-html: After further investigation into this, the problem is happening when there is a fixture that starts with the word test.
version.title: Unable to create any model and unit test that begin with the word 'Test'

version.body:
Test is a reserved word.
Although this list is old, it still has most of the reserved words: http://wiki.rubyonrails.org/rails/pages/reservedwords
version.body-html:
Test is a reserved word.

Although this list is old, it still has most of the reserved words: http://wiki.rubyonrails.org/rails/pages/reservedwords
version.title: Unable to create any model and unit test that begin with the word 'Test'
